articles.title: DJI Mini 4 Pro Drone Announced - Omnidirectional Obstacle Sensing, ActiveTrack 360°, 4K 100fps Slow-Mo - CineD
articles.description: The DJI Mini 4 Pro was just announced, and it will finally have omnidirectional obstacle sensing as well as 4K 100 fps slow-motion.
articles.content: DJI just announced the DJI Mini 4 Pro, the new “Pro” version of its entry-level drone. And finally, it has omnidirectional obstacle sensing, which is a particularly important feature for beginners an… [+6449 chars]

articles.author: Michael Nuñez
articles.title: Google Bard fails to deliver on its promise — even after latest updates - VentureBeat
articles.description: The all new Google Bard 2.0 is here, but it stinks. So far, at least. Maybe Google’s upcoming model “Gemini” will be the fix it’s looking for. But until then, I recommend relying on GPT-4 for the bulk of your work tasks.
